comment._content: Hi, this photo has been discussed in one of the threads in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool.

comment.author: 15840912@N08
comment._content:
Is it Pauline Bush?..

Pauline Bush (22 May 1886 – 1 November 1969) was an American silent film actress.

Nicknamed "The Madonna of the Movies", she married actor Allan Dwan in 1915. They divorced in 1921.
